name: ArgoCMS
description: A task, project, team, and user management system created in ASP.NET Core.

name: CatFactsAgain
description: Request random cat facts from an external API using a Blazor frontend and ASP.NET backend.

name: HabitLogger
description: C# console app that lets you store habits and log how often you perform that habbit. All database queries written in code, for fun.
altText: Slideshow GIF showing multiple screens of the Argo App

name: YellowPages
description: C# console app that lets you keep a list of contacts that you can organise into categories.
